hotels.title: Sophisticated Richmond City Retreat near Iconic Shockhoe Slip with Restaurant & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience the old-world charms of Virginia's capital with a stay at this historic Richmond address, a beacon of Southern hospitality and elegance. Perfectly situated mere moments from the treasured Shockoe Slip district, Virginia State Capitol and the idyllic James River, this architectural gem makes for easy explorations in the 'Mother of States'. Unwind in the modern and beautifully appointed rooms, go for a swim in the tranquil indoor pool, savour the flavours of the South at Westham Porch and tuck into locally inspired plates and sip on craft cocktails at the lively Westham Tavern. For a taste of culture, the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts and the American Civil War Museum are just a short drive away.
